0.text: Bug 32770  Java application launch shortcut error doesn't help user.

2.text: Open a java file containing a main method.

4.text: Select a non-resource-based view (such as the Debug view).

8.text: A dialog appears: "Launch failed: no main type found".

9.text: We should consider tracking resource selection the way external tools tracks selection for variable expansion (in fact, we should be able to combine the two into a single mechanism?).

10.text: Also, we should improve the quality of the error message.

11.text: The message should give the user a hint about what they need to do to fix the problem - in this case, they need to select a resource.

12.text: The message should say something like "Launch failed: No file with a main type selected"
